synonyms: Congenital Lipomatous Overgrowth with Vascular malformations, Epidermal nevi, and Scoliosis/Skeletal abnormalities
content.definition: A rare PIK3CA-related overgrowth syndrome characterized by congenital lipomatous overgrowth, complex vascular malformations (capillary, venous, lymphatic, and arteriovenous), epidermal nevi, and skeletal/spinal abnormalities. Part of the PIK3CA-related overgrowth spectrum (PROS).

pathophysiology.etiology: Somatic activating mutations in PIK3CA gene
pathophysiology.related_conditions: Part of PIK3CA-related overgrowth spectrum (PROS) with Klippel-Trenaunay, megalencephaly syndromes

diagnosis.imaging: MRI for extent of overgrowth and vascular malformations
diagnosis.genetic: Detection of PIK3CA mutation in affected tissue (not blood)
diagnosis.differential: Distinguish from Proteus syndrome, Klippel-Trenaunay syndrome

surveillance: Regular spinal imaging for scoliosis progression
Monitor for Wilms tumor (slightly increased risk)
pharmacologic: Alpelisib (PIK3CA inhibitor) - FDA approved for PROS
